name: No Rest for the Wicked
storyline: Inside a manor frozen in time, a vampire patiently waits for the right moment to rise again. The time has come, and it's up to you - his not so faithful servant - to help him make the spell that will bring humanity to an end.
summary: This is a point and click game. Made in 14 days for Adventure Jam 2023.
